question: Which two countries are connected by the "Oresund Bridge"?
explanation: Oresund Bridge is a rail-motor bridge constructed across the Oresund Strait to connect both Denmark and Sweden. It is an 8km-four lanes rail-motor bridge. It was the longest combined road and rail bridge in Europe from 2009 to 2019. This bridge made possible the connectivity between Central-Western Europe and Scandinavia.
